GSD_BASICS.title: GSD Fundamental Flow
GSD_BASICS.description: Master the primary implementation loop from Initialization to Planning.

steps.instruction: Initialize a GSD cycle with the objective: 'Learn the System'.
Perform a Knowledge Pulse to align with the latest system state.
Generate a Mission Brief using the mission.js tool.
